mistral:7b-instruct: This PPO plan from AIA Health Insurance offers comprehensive coverage for your medical needs, including hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care - which aligns well with managing hypertension. With a monthly premium of $420, it's affordable for an upper-middle income bracket individual, while providing a substantial coverage of $750,000 and a manageable maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6000. Given your risk level of 72.0, this plan balances both coverage and affordability to meet your healthcare needs effectively.
